ygData.subject: Re: Anyone know what language a lot of those books that ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Re: Anyone know what language a lot of those books that have spell recipies are in? Is it High Erudian? Anyone know of any monsters that give words and so
ygData.messageBody:
Re: Anyone know what language a lot of those books that have spell recipies
are in? Is it High Erudian? Anyone know of any monsters that give words and
so forth??

The books are all different languages. Each one a different one. So ... you
will need to learn them all. There seem to be Old Erudian, Ancient Elvish,
Elder Tir'Dal. There is also Lizardman and Gnoll. I have 4 books, and it
looks like each is a different language. I believe that my first one is
Ancient Eleven ... only because I am average in this skill, and I can almost
make it out. (I am A Dark Elf Necro)

And I have found words/runes on Orc, Fungi Men, Frogloks, and Goblins. They
tend to be on the "intelligent" critters. Randomly.
